statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE meter_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_reports WHERE meter_id = 100 AND report_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meter_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM smart_meter_data WHERE meter_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meter_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND latitude > 40;
DELETE FROM meter_errors WHERE error_type = 'Critical' AND meter_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM meter_readings WHERE reading < 50 AND reading_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM analyzed_consumption WHERE meter_id = 100 AND analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meter_locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90;
